column2: Large primary tumor on top of head and on back of neck, wrapped around left arm onto front of ribcage. Appeared slightly lethargic, may have been from extensive tumor burden.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Brown nodule present on one of lungs
Tumor chunks frozen and cell line attempted.
